page.title: 17Holiday Habits in N.St Ives.
page.content: We have been asking questions about holidays .Hunstanton is a very popular place for holidays in this area.That is because it is near , and it is cheap and it is a very nice place . Most people go on a selfcatering holiday so they do everything themselves. Most people stay in Britain for their holidays,though some people go abroad.The most popular places abroad are France and Spain.France is popular because it is relatively close. Hunstanton is a very pleasant sea side resort.It can be quite warm in the summer.There is a sandy beach,and a fair and amusements.In the town you can buy most things.Many people from our area go to stay in caravans or chalets.They find that then they can please themselves,rather than be told what to do.
